name: AlcidaeSmartLife
0:
”Alexa, open Garage Door”
”Alexa, turn on Garage Door”
”Alexa, lock Garage Door”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can use Alexa to control all of your Alcidae devices! You can operate your garage simply by saying “Alexa, open Garage Door”.

1)Download the Alcidae app from Apple App Store or Google Play Store (skip to step 4 if you have already set up your cameras).
2)Log in to your Alcidae account or create a new one.
3)Click the Plus sign and follow the on-screen instructions to add your Alcidae devices.
4)Download and open the Amazon Alexa app and log in to your Amazon account.
5)In the Alexa app, tap the top left corner for the menu and select “Skills & Games”.
6)Search for “Alcidae Smart Life”, select it, and click Enable To Use.
7)Link your Alcidae account with Alcidae username and password.

And that’s it! Just speak to Alexa to control your Alcidae devices! You do not even need to invoke or prompt with a different word, just say “Alexa, open [garage name]!”
